Wwise Unity Integration » Build for target platform

Build using Xcode GUI on Mac OS X Mountain Lion

See Build the Integration code for general instructions about building the Integration.

Follow the general instructions to build the Integration in the Unity Editor or from the command line.

The environment variable feature for GUI programs was removed in Mac OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion. To build the Integration with the Xcode GUI, allow the build script to find the native Wwise SDK by defining, the custom build variable WWISESDK in the Xcode project build settings.
